item.description: I thought it would be fun for a bunch of us to have dinner & go bowling together. For two rounds of bowling & dinner, it usually costs a total of about $30. But for the people that want alcohol, it could cost more. The closest T stop for this meetup event is the Hynes Convention Center T stop. We'll all meet each other in the restaurant area of King's, have dinner together & then bowl. I will be sending out an e-mail to all of the attendees with my contact info in case anybody can't find our group.
item.how_to_find_us: We will all be meeting in the restaurant area of King's
item.name: Let's go Bowling! :)
